page.title: 12Old Folks Attitudes:Fairford
page.content: Four old people were asked questions about the{changes}which have taken place in the Fairford area during their lives. They thought there is more{vandalism} now due largely to bored. They believed schools should be able to use the cane. They thought the{Air Force Base}was not much of an asset but it made employment for some local people, employed in cleaning,radio and tv rentals,canteen assistants, as well as the Air Force Personnel. Having moved at least once they still liked living in the Fairford Area because they were born there and their friends still live there.
